name: Tim Marner
description: Here’s why you should go out with me, besides the fact that we've got great chemistry: You’ve got a new product, or a great business idea, yes, but do you have a brand; Do you have something which you and others can believe in, something which makes you stand out from the crowd? Well I can make your brand flirt, tease, attract and entice, and get you exactly what you want. Just like I'm doing now. Ding ding
